definition: to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: He went to Madame Carp's shop and pretended to help Anneliese.
sentences.chinese: 他到了卡帕女士的商店，假裝來幫助安妮絲。

sentences.english: Lhakpa told the policeman where she saw the yeti.
sentences.chinese: 拉卡帕告訴了警察她遭遇雪人的地方。

sentences.english: Tod eventually meets a hunting dog named Copper and the two hit it off.
sentences.chinese: 託德後來遇見了一直名叫卡帕的獵狗，他倆好上了。

sentences.english: Kapaks believe that draconians should determine their own destiny.
sentences.chinese: 卡帕克龍人相信龍人能夠決定自己的命運。

sentences.english: Aren't you frightened to walk in the mountains alone, Lhakpa?
sentences.chinese: 拉卡帕，你一個人在山裏走不害怕嗎？

sentences.english: One day in 1974, Lhakpa took her yaks up the mountain as usual.
sentences.chinese: 年的一天，拉卡帕和往常一樣趕着犛牛到山上放牧。
但是拉卡帕沒有被嚇住。

sentences.english: However, Tshikapa resident Henri Tshibuyi said two people died.
sentences.chinese: 然而，一名奇卡帕居民說，有2名囚犯死亡。

sentences.english: For thousands of years, people lived in the caves of Kapadokya.
sentences.chinese: 數千年來，人們都住在卡帕多奇亞區的洞穴裏。

sentences.english: Then Lhakpa got out of the stream and ran home.
sentences.chinese: 後來，拉卡帕從山溪中出來，跑回家了。

sentences.english: I prepare for a Cappadocia sunrise from a hot-air balloon.
sentences.chinese: 我準備從熱氣球上觀賞卡帕多基亞的日出吧。

definition: Jean-Paul Sartre (1905-1980), French existential philosopher and novelist
Ernesto Che Guevara (1928-1967), Cuban Revolution leader
gelada (Theropithecus gelada), Ethiopian herbivorous monkey similar to baboon
Klein or Kline (name)/Felix Klein (1849-1925), German mathematician
becquerel (unit of radioactivity, symbol Bq)/abbr. for 貝克勒爾|贝克勒尔[bei4 ke4 le4 er3]
